titleStmt.title: A fannaticks alarm, given to the mayor in his quarters, by one of the sons of Zion, become Boanerges to thunder out the judgements of God against oppression and oppressors, together with some flashings of pure gospel-lightnings, really intended for the enlightning the eyes of the understanding, even to the beholding of Him who is invisible / by Henry Adis ...
titleStmt.author: Adis, Henry.
